name: Pugna
title: Grandmaster of Oblivion
lore: A master of dark magic, Pugna's life force manipulation makes him deadly to magic users.

netherBlast.name: Nether Blast
netherBlast.description: Creates an explosion of nether energy that damages enemies and buildings.

decrepify.name: Decrepify
decrepify.description: Target becomes ethereal, taking amplified magic damage but immune to physical attacks.

netherWard.name: Nether Ward
netherWard.description: Summons a ward that damages enemies when they cast spells based on mana spent.

lifeDrain.name: Life Drain
lifeDrain.description: Drains health from an enemy, healing Pugna. Can target allies to heal them.
